lhcmask
===================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   api

Function to create a yaml file with timestamps.

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install lhcmask

Usage
-----
Run a pymask file, this will create / overwrite a yaml file with timestamps for different steps of the pymask.

.. code-block:: python

   >>> run 000_pymask.py

==================
